question: Hi :)I recently started (past 2 days) to have throbbing pain right under my left breast and directly behind in my back.  I have had no changes in my bowel habits...no acid reflux is present. This pain does not occur after eating either..seems random...I had my gallbladder out about 5 years ago..Just stopped working..no stones.  Hard to say if any other symptoms are connected as I just had a baby via c-section 12 weeks ago...so..sleep deprived.  I don't want to waste my time in the doctors office if this is likely to be no big deal..That said, if it could be something dangerous..being home with 2 small children..I would go.  Any thoughts on what could be going on?  Oh, I also had gestational diabetes with both pregnancies....My specialist thinks I went into type 2 right after my first in Jan 08 as I tested very early (16 weeks) with this last pregnancy for the diabetes.  I still need to go to confirm whether the diabetes has left or not. Plan on doing in January.Thanks for any help you can give..Anna
title: Left side front/back rib pain
